content: square dishcloth materials ● 4mm crochet hook ● dk cotton yarn i used half a cake of spin spin dk yarn by rico per dish cloth ● needle ● scissors pattern row one chain 27 starting in second chain from hook double_crochet treble_crochet x13 26 row two - twenty six chain 1 and turn your work double_crochet treble_crochet x13 till end of row 26 row twenty seven double_crochet around all the edges and crochet 3 double_crochet in each corner lay work flat after each edge to make sure it is still the original shape when you reach the top again row 26 double_crochet in all stitches and slip_stitch in the first double_crochet of the corner fasten_off and weave in ends thanks so much for using my pattern i hope you enjoyed making this as much as i did
